name: Personalised Christening Necklace
description:
This necklace makes a fitting Christening, First Communion, Baptism or Confirmation gift. ...and is perfect for a wedding.

A delightful (15mm) puffy sterling silver heart, adorned with a mother of pearl cross, a freshwater pearl and a hand-crafted clay heart sit on a slim 16'' sterling silver trace chain.

The clay heart can be personalised with a single initial, making an extra special gift. Please choose an initial from the menu, or choose to leave the clay heart plain.

You can now choose from several colours, but please be aware that the clay heart and freshwater pearl will change colour but the mother of pearl cross will always be ivory in colour.


Presented in a grey fingerprints gift box, it comes with a tag that explains the story behind our name...and a proverb for inspiration.

PLEASE VISIT OUR FULL SITE AT WWW.FINGERPRINTS.UK.COM to view our full collections.

name: Child's Butterfly Heart Necklace
description:
Part of our Purity Collection, this sterling silver necklace makes an ideal Christening, Communion or Bridal gift. With a delightful silver puff heart (15mm) and mini butterfly (10mm), a hand-crafted clay heart and co-ordinating fresh water pearl, it comes on a 16" silver ball chain. A longer chain is available (see options).

It can be personalised with an initial on the clay heart, or left plain.

Presented in a beautiful gift box, each piece comes with a tag that explains the story behind our name...and a proverb for inspiration.

PLEASE VISIT OUR FULL SITE AT WWW.FINGERPRINTS.UK.COM to view our full collections.

name: Personalised Christening Corsage Bracelet
description:
This suede drawstring bracelet makes a fitting Christening, First Communion, Baptism or Confirmation gift. ...and is perfect for a wedding.

A delightful14mm puffy sterling silver heart, adorned with a mother of pearl cross, a freshwater pearl and a hand-crafted clay heart sit on co-ordinating soft suede thong, that can be adjusted to fit any wrist size, making it suitable for anyone aged 3 years and above.

The clay heart can be personalised with a single initial, making an extra special gift. Please select an initial from the menu, or choose to leave the clay heart plain.

You can now choose from several colours, but please be aware that the suede, clay heart and freshwater pearl will change colour but the mother of pearl cross will always be ivory in colour.

Presented in a grey fingerprints gift box, it comes with a tag that explains the story behind our name...and a proverb for inspiration.

PLEASE VISIT OUR FULL SITE AT WWW.FINGERPRINTS.UK.COM to view our full collections.

name: Personalised Christening Pendant
description:
This pendant makes a fitting Christening, Baptism or Confirmation gift. ...and is perfect for a wedding.

A delightful14mm puffy sterling silver heart, adorned with a mother of pearl cross, a freshwater pearl and a hand-crafted clay heart sit on co-ordinating 90cm soft suede thong, that can be adjusted to wear at any length, making it suitable for anyone aged 3 years and above.

The clay heart can be personalised with a single initial, making an extra special gift. Please select an initial from the menu, or choose to leave the clay heart plain.

You can now choose from several colours, but please be aware that the suede, clay heart and freshwater pearl will change colour but the mother of pearl cross will always be ivory in colour.


Presented in a grey fingerprints gift box, it comes with a tag that explains the story behind our name...and a proverb for inspiration.

name: Personalised Christening Charm Bracelet
description:
A delightful charm bracelet in vanilla hues, with mother of pearl dove, cross and heart charms, freshwater pearls, hand-crafted clay beads and a sterling silver butterfly charm, all on a 6'' long sterling silver chain, with a 1.5'' extender. The wrist size is fully adjustable, so it is suitable for children from 3 years old, right up to adulthood.

This timeless piece can grow with a young child and fit them at every stage of life...and is ideal for a fully grown adult too! It makes a fitting gift for a Christening, First Communion, Baptism or Confirmation, or as a wedding accessory.

For an extra special touch we can personalise one of the clay hearts with a single initial, or with up to 3 initials in total (on 3 separate hearts). Please select whether you require personalisation or not and the letter you require.

 If you would like more than one initial please indicate at the checkout in the 'instructions to seller' box.

It is presented in a lovely fingerprints grey gift box and organza bag and comes with a tag that explains the story behind our name...and a proverb for inspiration.

PLEASE VISIT OUR FULL SITE AT WWW.FINGERPRINTS.UK.COM to view our full collections.
